Power & Command.description: Power & Command's damage boost amplifies Berserker's Eye's increased damage

Bloody Reach.description: Distance damage bonus from Bloody Reach stacks with Berserker's Eye's damage increase

Fervent Fang.description: Fervent Fang's stacking damage bonus multiplies with Berserker's Eye's damage increase

Blood-Soaked Jade.description: Blood-Soaked Jade's full life damage bonus stacks multiplicatively with Berserker's Eye

Igneous Scorn.description: Cutthroat's Grin increases critical hit damage, which directly amplifies Igneous Scorn's critical hit explosions

Seeping Bile.description: Critical hits from behind with increased damage from Cutthroat's Grin have higher chance to apply Seeping Bile's poison

Power & Command.description: Power & Command's damage boost increases the effectiveness of Cutthroat's Grin's critical hits

Mourneskull.description: Mourneskull's Royal Dominion damage boost amplifies Cutthroat's Grin's critical hits

Pain of Subjugation.description: Pain of Subjugation's damage increase to controlled enemies stacks with Seeping Bile's poison damage

Bloody Reach.description: Bloody Reach allows applying Seeping Bile's poison from a safe distance

Fervent Fang.description: Fervent Fang's stacking damage bonus amplifies Seeping Bile's poison damage over time

Everlasting Torment.description: Everlasting Torment's bleed effect stacks with Seeping Bile's poison for powerful DOT combinations

Ca'arsen's Invigoration.description: Ca'arsen's Invigoration triggers beneficial effects that are amplified by Bottled Hope

Freedom and Devotion.description: Freedom and Devotion's beneficial effects are enhanced by Bottled Hope's buff boost

Echoing Shade.description: Bottled Hope's buff enhancement increases the damage output of Echoing Shade's shadow clones

Blood-Soaked Jade.description: Bottled Hope amplifies Blood-Soaked Jade's movement speed bonus for enhanced mobility

Blessing of the Worthy.description: Phoenix Ashes provides a second chance while Blessing of the Worthy turns incoming damage into outgoing damage

Unity Crystal.description: Unity Crystal's beneficial effects help maintain survival until Phoenix Ashes can activate

Chip of Stoned Flesh.description: Chip of Stoned Flesh's explosion damage is preserved through Phoenix Ashes' revival, creating a powerful death trigger

Frozen Heart.description: Frozen Heart's shield provides extra protection while waiting for Phoenix Ashes to become available again

Power & Command.description: Power & Command's damage boost affects both you and your shadow clones from Echoing Shade

Fervent Fang.description: Shadow clones from Echoing Shade help stack Fervent Fang's damage bonus faster

Mourneskull.description: Mourneskull's Royal Dominion affects shadow clones, and clones help maintain enemy count for maximum bonus

Blessing of the Worthy.description: Blessing of the Worthy's damage reflection synergizes with Chip of Stoned Flesh's explosion for massive counter damage

Unity Crystal.description: Unity Crystal helps survive long enough to maximize Chip of Stoned Flesh's stored damage

Frozen Heart.description: Frozen Heart's shield allows safely storing more damage for Chip of Stoned Flesh's explosion

Unity Crystal.description: Unity Crystal helps maintain full life to maximize Blood-Soaked Jade's damage bonus

Frozen Heart.description: Frozen Heart's shield protects against damage that would reduce Blood-Soaked Jade's effectiveness

Pain of Subjugation.description: Pain of Subjugation's damage boost to controlled enemies combines with Mourneskull's Royal Dominion for massive damage

Everlasting Torment.description: Mourneskull's Vile Spirits help apply Everlasting Torment's bleed effect to multiple targets
